mean_cn: v. 削尖；磨快；使敏捷；使提高
mean_en: to make something sharper; if a sense or feeling sharpens or something sharpens it, it becomes stronger and/or clearer; to become or make something better, more skillful, more effective, etc. than before
sentence: You must sharpen your pencil if you want to use it.
sentence_trans: 如果你想用铅笔的话，要先削尖它。
word_etyma: sharp尖 + en动词后缀  → sharpen削尖
